description: The iP16 is a sleek little stereo alarm clock for your iPhone or iPod that lets you charge and play your iPhone or iPod and wake or sleep to your favorite music. Operates on batteries for music on the go, or use the universal switching power supply to run the iP16 from an outlet. Featuring Reson8 sound technology for an exceptional audio experience, plus extras like a line-in jack and easy Daylight Saving Time switch.
title: iHome iP16GX Portable 30-Pin iPod/iPhone Alarm Clock Speaker Dock
